QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Zul'farrak
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Zul'farrak, just west of Gadgetzan, immediately!$B$BGadgetzan is being threatened by the Sandfury trolls and their growing army! If you so choose, head to Zul'farrak and speak with Tran'rek to help the goblins out.
